00001000000010000000001111111111 # move 2 into register 0
00001000000010000100001111111111 # move 2 into register 1
00001010000000000000000000000000 # print R0
00001010000000000000000000000000 # print R0
00000000000001000000000000000000 # add r0 and r1 and store in r1 + flags set
00001010000000000000000000000000 # print r0
00001000010010111000000000001000 # loop until overflow occurs

*
!
